original_text: At night, my bones are painful. The pain is always there in my body. At night, my bones are painful. The pain is always there in my body. At night, my bones are painful.
korean_text: 밤이 되면 내 뼈가 쑤시니 나의 아픔이 쉬지 아니하는구나

sentences.original_text: At night, my bones are painful.
The pain is always there in my body.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 고통은 항상 내 몸에 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: At night, my bones are painful.
The pain is always there in my body.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 고통은 항상 내 몸에 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: At night, my bones are painful.
